briefdescription.para: The cameras that can be used for rendering.
The camera that is currently being used for rendering.
Refers to the rendering settings stored in Rayex::settings.

simplesect.para: Returns all geometry instances in the scene.

briefdescription.para: Used to submit a geometry instance for rendering.

parameterdescription.para: The instance to queue for rendering.

simplesect.para: This function does not invoke any draw calls.

briefdescription.para: Used to submit multiple geometry instances for rendering, replacing all existing instances.

parameterdescription.para: The instances to queue for rendering.

simplesect.para: This function does not invoke any draw calls.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove a geometry instance.

detaileddescription.para:
Once a geometry instance was removed, it will no longer be rendered.
geometryInstance
The instance to remove.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove all geometry instances.

detaileddescription.para: However, geometries remain loaded and must be deleted explicitely.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove the last geometry instance.
Used to submit a geometry and set up its buffers.

detaileddescription.para:
Once a geometry was submitted, geometry instances referencing this particular geometry can be drawn.
geometry
The geometry to submit.

briefdescription.para: Used to submit multiple geometries and set up their buffers.

detaileddescription.para:
Once a geometry was submitted, geometry instances referencing this particular geometry can be drawn.
geometries
The geometries to submit.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove the last geometry and all its instances.
Used to retrieve a geoemtry based on its path.

parameterdescription.para: The geometry's model's path, relative to the path to assets.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a custom camera.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Camera object.

simplesect.para: Returns a pointer to the renderer's camera.

briefdescription.para: Stores all geoemtry, geometry instances and light sources.

detaileddescription.para:
Provides functions to change said data. Todo
removeGeometry()
